card.name: Saint Bolshack, Elemental Dragon Knight
card.text: ■ Multi ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each Angel Command and Armored Dragon in your graveyard. It can't cost less than 2. ■ Speed Attacker ■ Power Attacker ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Geo Goctra, Armed Dragon
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Samurai Generation ■ Your other creatures in the battle zone that cost 4 or more get +2000 power and become Armored Dragon, Earth Dragon and Samurai in addition to their current race(s). ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Divine Machine Armor Valborg
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Humans. ■ While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each other fire creature in the battle zone. ■ Double Breaker
